content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_crimson_hyphae
inventory=[{"type": "magenta_stained_glass", "quantity": 37, "index": 17}, {"type": "magenta_carpet", "quantity": 53, "index": 20}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 4, "index": 23}, {"type": "crimson_trapdoor", "quantity": 24, "index": 25}, {"type": "iron_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "golden_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 55, "index": 34}, {"type": "prismarine_shard", "quantity": 29, "index": 35}, {"type": "music_disc_13", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]

thought: To craft stripped_crimson_hyphae, I need to place 4 stripped_crimson_stem in a 2x2 grid in the crafting table. The first stripped_crimson_stem is at slot 23, and I will move it to the first slot in the crafting table (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_crimson_hyphae
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "magenta_stained_glass", "quantity": 37, "index": 17}, {"type": "magenta_carpet", "quantity": 53, "index": 20}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 3, "index": 23}, {"type": "crimson_trapdoor", "quantity": 24, "index": 25}, {"type": "iron_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "golden_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 55, "index": 34}, {"type": "prismarine_shard", "quantity": 29, "index": 35}, {"type": "music_disc_13", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]
thought: I have placed the first stripped_crimson_stem in slot 1, and now I will move the next one to slot 2 (to the right of slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_crimson_hyphae
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "magenta_stained_glass", "quantity": 37, "index": 17}, {"type": "magenta_carpet", "quantity": 53, "index": 20}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 2, "index": 23}, {"type": "crimson_trapdoor", "quantity": 24, "index": 25}, {"type": "iron_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "golden_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 55, "index": 34}, {"type": "prismarine_shard", "quantity": 29, "index": 35}, {"type": "music_disc_13", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]
thought: The next stripped_crimson_stem needs to be placed below the first one. The first one is at slot 1, and slot 4 is below slot 1, so I will move the stripped_crimson_stem to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_crimson_hyphae
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "magenta_stained_glass", "quantity": 37, "index": 17}, {"type": "magenta_carpet", "quantity": 53, "index": 20}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "crimson_trapdoor", "quantity": 24, "index": 25}, {"type": "iron_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "golden_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 55, "index": 34}, {"type": "prismarine_shard", "quantity": 29, "index": 35}, {"type": "music_disc_13", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]
thought: The last stripped_crimson_stem needs to be placed to the right of the one at slot 4. Slot 5 is to the right of slot 4, so I will move the last stripped_crimson_stem to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_crimson_hyphae
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "magenta_stained_glass", "quantity": 37, "index": 17}, {"type": "magenta_carpet", "quantity": 53, "index": 20}, {"type": "crimson_trapdoor", "quantity": 24, "index": 25}, {"type": "iron_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "golden_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 55, "index": 34}, {"type": "prismarine_shard", "quantity": 29, "index": 35}, {"type": "music_disc_13", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]
thought: Now that I have placed all the stripped_crimson_stem in the correct positions, I can craft the stripped_crimson_hyphae and move it to an empty inventory slot (eg., slot 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 3
